text: Era mumanye nti omunyago gwonna gwemuba muggye ku mulabe, mazima kimu kyakutaano kyagwo kya Katonda, n’omubaka, nab’oluganda olw'okumpi olwa Nabbi, ne ba mulekwa, n’a banaku, n’omutambuze, bwe muba nga mwakkiriza Katonda n'ebyo bye twassa ku muddu waffe (Muhammad) ku lunaku Katonda lwe yayawula amazima ku bulimba, olunaku e bibinja e bibiri lwe byasisinkana (ku lutalo e Badri), bulijjo Katonda w’a buyinza ku buli kintu
